Class BCK.ANN.BCKFilter 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----BCK.ANN.BCKFilter
public class BCKFilter
extends Object
The filter provides an interface to test and training data for Neural Networks it handles the conversion of text tags to numeric values. It also handles the randomisation of the order of records.
